item.title: BO - Advanced Parameters - Informations
item.description: BO - Advanced Parameters - Informations Details Component : Core Status : [TEST] To be automated Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-1133 Steps Step Description Expected result Bo to BO > Configure > Advanced Parameters > Information The Information page should display correctly Click on Help button on top right corner Help card is displayed from the right side of the page Case1
